title: Good Omens: Teaser Trailer - NYCC 2018
author: IGN
comment: David Tennant in your show automatically gives you a +2 to review scores
Honestly, I'm just hyped to see what the Four Motorbikers of The Apocalypse look like in the show.
I’m a simple man. I see David Tenant, I click.
The soundtrack for this trailer was supposed to be REM but they left it in a car for too long
I really like the book and it seems that the adaptation will be "Nice and Accurate".
description:
Here's the first teaser trailer for Amazon Prime Video's Good Omens. The series will premiere in 2019.

Catch up on Everything NYCC here!
